efs
v. 0.3.0
  1. org.efs.timer
  2. EfsScheduledExecutor
  3. IEfsTimer

Uses of Interface
org.efs.timer.EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer

Packages that use EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer
Package
Description
org.efs.timer
efs provides a high precision timer via EfsScheduledExecutor which provides a similar functionality as ScheduledExecutorService with the difference that expired timer tasks are dispatched to an efs agent's event queue.

  • Uses of EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer in org.efs.timer

    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer
    A scheduled timer task which may be active, expired, or canceled.

    EfsScheduledExecutor.mTimers

    Methods in org.efs.timer that return EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer
    EfsScheduledExecutor.schedule(String timerName, Consumer<EfsTimerEvent> callback, IEfsAgent agent, Duration delay)
    Submits a single-shot task which expires after the given delay.
    EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer
    EfsScheduledExecutor.scheduleAtFixedRate(String timerName, Consumer<EfsTimerEvent> callback, IEfsAgent agent, Duration initialDelay, Duration period)
    Submits a periodic task which expires for the first time after the initial delay and then repeatedly at the periodic rate.
    EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer
    EfsScheduledExecutor.scheduleWithFixedDelay(String timerName, Consumer<EfsTimerEvent> callback, IEfsAgent agent, Duration initialDelay, Duration delay)
    Submits a periodic task which expires for the first time after the initial delay and then repeatedly with the given delay between the termination of the previous expiration and the commencement of the next.
